item.title: Whonix for VirtualBox - 14.0.0.9.6 - Release Candidate 1 - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Thereâ€™s no sdwdate-server. And unlikely one will materialize. sdwdate (client) is already lacking developer time.

It may not even be easy to run an sdwdate-server inside a VM. Ideally an sdwdate-server would have an atomic clock connected. How? By USB most likely unless there are better options than USB atomic click. TODO research.

Whonix-Gateway CLI has sdwdate (client) installed as all flavors of Whonix.

Read full topic
